faqs.question: When is the casino open?
faqs.answer: Open 24 hours, 7 days a week unless stated otherwise.

faqs.question: When does the dream pool open?
faqs.answer: The Dreampool opens after Labor day. The pool at the Inn and Chalets open around the same time. Further information to come!

faqs.question: How many comps can people get?
faqs.answer: Segments 1-3 can have unlimited nights per a Host or Supervisor, 4-7 can have 3 comp nights, then it goes to discounted night then normal rate. 8-9 can have 2 comp nights, then discounted then normal rate.

faqs.question: How do i do a B2B
faqs.answer: In LMS have the first reservation pulled up. Hit F12 and type the next confirmation number in. Once you have the next reservation up go to the Action line, put 2 in it and hit enter. It should now be set as a B2B.

faqs.question: What are this months discount offers?
faqs.answer: Currently we have for January is Birdie, Happy25. For February we have Cupid and Love. Let me know which one you want more information on or click Here to go the section that has all the information.
